text: Happy Go Lucky () is a 1972 Soviet comedy movie directed by Vasily Shukshin.Прощай, Афоня! Умер Леонид КуравлевПечки-лавочки It stars Vasily Shukshin, Lidiya Fedoseyeva-Shukshina, and Vsevolod Sanayev. == Actors == * Vasily Shukshin as Ivan Rastorguyev * Lidiya Fedoseyeva-Shukshina as Nyura Rastorgueva * Vsevolod Sanayev as Professor * Georgi Burkov as Viktor, fake сonstructor, thief * Zinovy Gerdt as 2nd professor * Ivan Ryzhov as Train steward == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1972 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Vasily Shukshin
title: Happy Go Lucky (1972 movie)
